name: Knight
description:
You were but a child when you joined an ancient knight's order, pledging yourself to a stringent code of
honor.
lootDescription: 1h weapon, shield, and heavy armor item

name: Mercenary
description:
Your experiences with The Dread Wolves prepared you for warfare. Though this rigorous training left you
scarred in more ways than one, your wits on the battlefield remain sharp as ever.
lootDescription:
50-80 gold
[p]2h weapon and heavy armor item

name: Street Urchin
description:
Raised by The Shade Collective, you were trained to be agile. Captivated by coin and other rare items, your
troublesome past and second-rate diet have caused your vitality to take a hit.
lootDescription: 1h weapon and two light armor items

name: Hunter
description:
You grew up in the forests of Enalia, hunting animals for food and learning to forage for supplies. You've
slept with a bow at your side for as long as you can remember.
lootDescription:
Campsite kit
[p]Ranged weapon and light armor item

name: Traveller
description:
You've come a long way, picking up many talents along the way -- save for refined social skills. You
often find yourself drawn to the road with no particular destination in mind.
lootDescription:
Map
[p]3 random potions
[p]1h weapon and light armor item

name: Brawler
description:
Banished from your hometown after one too many fights, you have nothing left but the shirt on your back.
Your impetuousness may serve you well in an untamable world.
lootDescription:
6 Feverfew Ale
[p]Starts with no weapons or armor

name: Chef
description:
More familiar with a ladle than a sword, you've nonetheless found yourself struggling to survive in the
outside world after being falsely accused of poisoning your previous patron.

name: Druid
description:
Trained by the Leafborn to use Nature Magic, you've left your peaceful ways behind to directly face the
growing evils spread throughout the crumbling Kingdom.
lootDescription:
4 Recovery Potions
[p]Staff and light armor item

name: Commoner
description:
A peasant with no adventuring experience whatsoever, you've spent your life laboring under the sun.
With nothing but a mysterious amulet and a strange calling that pulls at your very soul, you venture into
the unknown.
lootDescription:
Mysterious amulet
[p]Farm weapon and farm clothes
warning: Warning: This character is highly challenging

name: Pyromancer
description:
Your parents sent you to the Tempest Order to shape your gift. Before your training was complete, you walked
away, driven by a fire that wanted something more.

name: Fulminar
description:
Your fortune changed after stealing a magic-infused ring from the Tempest Order. Now you wield the thunder
they sought to control.
lootDescription:
Robes, and a staff or cudgel
[p]Storm-infused ring

name: Knight-Explorer (MOD)
description: A seasoned knight who learned the ways of the road. Merged with travellerÆs savvy. (MOD)
lootDescription:
Map
[p]3 random potions
[p]1h weapon and light armor item
